name: Infinite Space Vine!
description:
Endless Runner with online leader boards, set in space!How to play!

Avoid space crystal while you try to get as far as possible on the mysterious space vine.

  • Arrow keys to move left or right.
  • ESC to pause
  • Space to start the game from menus.
  • Click on "Playing as" to change name for the leader boards.
Patch NotesV1.3 (Current) - 11/3/2015Features
  • Updated "Ship" Model, it now has a nose which makes it looks more like a ship then a helmet.
  • There is now Limited Controller support, Press A to start the game (as long as no panels are currently active), D-pad or left thumb stick to move left or right.
  • FOV Slider
Fixes
  • Tweaked the HUD a little to fit the new model more
  • Moved the camera around (Still not loving the position)
  • Made Cursor viable while paused, useful for closing the game...
  • Removed a camera, now just move around the main one.
Broke
  • Resolution and Full screen options are mostly broken now, so I deactivated it.
  • Probably tons more.
Planned features/fixes
  • Fix resolutions again or at least add the default unity one back until fixed.
  • Simplify the options menu, there is no reason to be fancy
  • Make defaults for the options.
  • Death effect, particles and sound effect.
  • Buttons on the pause menu for quitting or restarting.
  • More variation of the obstacle
V1.2 - 11/3/2015Fixes
  • Fixed leader boards, players should now be prompted to enter their name at the first boot of the game, as well as anytime the name is gone for whatever reason.
  • Reset button under options now reset everything, including your name and options.
  • Its no longer possible to start the game while the Options or Name entry panels are open.
  • Deactivated Development build Whoops! File size is a lot smaller now.

Made for Novices Now over 2 weeks (Originally) in Unity By @Wagosaur.

Screenshots are from different stages in development.
